aws_services: S3 Bucket, CloudFormation, Lambda, EventBridge, CloudWatch LogGroup, Sns

training_quality.notes: PROMPT is clear and concise. IDEAL_RESPONSE demonstrates comprehensive CloudFormation implementation with security best practices, proper IAM policies, CloudWatch monitoring, custom resources for S3 notifications, and complete error handling. MODEL_RESPONSE shows a basic, flawed implementation with security issues (overly broad IAM permissions), circular dependencies, missing components (SNS, CloudWatch), and deployment problems. This provides strong training contrast between poor and excellent implementations.
identified_issues: lib/TapStack.json appears to be an incomplete version missing critical resources (CloudWatch alarms, dashboard, S3 notification configuration, custom resource Lambda)
lib/IDEAL_RESPONSE.md only documents TapStack.yml but not TapStack.json which also exists in lib/ folder

author: barun-turing
